p: The electrodes were tested for the ORR in 0.1 M NaOH aqueous solutions at room temperature. cyclic voltammetry (CV) and linear scan voltammetry (LSV) measurements were done from 0.2 to 1 V vs. RHE at a scan rate of 10 mV s −1. For rotating disk electrode (RDE) measurements, the rotation speed ( ω) of the electrode was adjusted using a Pine rotator.
